content: chain 1 turn row 4 1 single_crochet in first stitch and into each stitch all the way across join colour b in the final stitch chain 1 turn repeat row 1-4 until the washcloth is square ending with row 2 and colour b on final single_crochet join colour a for the border border in colour a row 1 1 single_crochet in every stitch to the end chain 1 turn row 2 1 single_crochet in every stitch to the end bind off idoruknits●idoruknits substack com●mediumwavecrochetwashclothv12
